one is that for indirect calculation it's all based on the r g b
coefficients.

the second is that 'specular reflection' will work just with sources and
not the environment.

so for instance if you are rendering a motorway with a wet asphalt it
will how the reflection of the luminaire but not the reflection of the
other objects.

what are you using BRDF for?

G.
